detailed_design.description: Design and implement UI for browsing the knowledge graph/vector store. Provides inspiration sidebar, semantic search, and visualization of related concepts. Supports capability.knowledge_graph from roadmap.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Design knowledge graph browser interface. 2. Implement semantic search UI. 3. Create inspiration sidebar widget. 4. Add graph visualization. 5. Connect to vector store backend.

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to browse my knowledge graph to find related ideas.
As a user, I want semantic search to find relevant past notes.
As a creative user, I want an inspiration sidebar suggesting related concepts.

technical_notes.current_issue: No UI for knowledge graph capability
